event.title: Two weeks ago, the board named

data.event: Two weeks ago, the board named Derrer as the sole finalist for the position.
A veteran of Hall County government, he retired in December 2007 after more than 25 years of service.

event.title: was fired as county manager in September 2008

data.event: He was elevated to the interim county manager spot after Rhonda Poston-O'Connor was fired as county manager in September 2008.
